greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A000120-deficiency of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum(A000120(d): 1 <= d < n and n mod d = 0) - A000120(n); see A175522 for motivation and more information;
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, Total[IntegerDigits[#, 2]]*(-1)^Boole[# == n]&]; Array[a, 80] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 05 2015, adapted from PARI *)
xref: Cf. A257691 (positions where a(n) <= 0), A294905 (and its char.fun).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 12 2011
